about_the_game:
Battlegrounds : The Pirate King is an action adventure game set in a nautical pirate world. Embark on an adventure to save what is left of the pirate world.
Discover islands and treasures, capture cargo ships and fight the king's navy.
Recruit pirates onboard your ship and manage your ship's resources.
Defeat Davy Jones and become a legend.

MAIN FEATURES

Complete story quests and meet unique characters as you assemble your allies for a final stand against the king

Maintain a steady amount of pirates onboard your ship while managing food and other resources to prevent a lack of attacking force

Trade with different pirate shops as you get the best deals for items you and your crew need

Battle the king and his navy fleet with your allies to secure your home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 10 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Radeon HD 6790 2GB VRAM*
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
